name: Jigsaw Journey - FREE Puzzle Game
description:
Jigsaw Journey – The completely FREE jigsaw game!

More than just a simple puzzle game - it’s packed full of FUN!

Journey through the USA as you piece together beautiful puzzles that show off gorgeous scenery. You won’t just have the pleasure of putting together beautiful jigsaw puzzles, you’ll also get to experience the joy of backpacking through America. Let’s get this journey started!

Unlike other jigsaw games in which you must buy most of the puzzles with real money, in Jigsaw Journey all puzzles are free to play! You'll also find this jigsaw game is far more exciting than traditional jigsaw games because of its special features. Sit back and relax, Jigsaw Journey will provide hours of entertainment for you and your family.

If you love jigsaw puzzles then this is a game that you won’t want to miss. Undoubtedly the best jigsaw puzzle game around!

Don't be fooled by other free jigsaw puzzle games. Once you download them, you'll discover that you have to buy puzzle packs, or you'll have no puzzles to play.

Important! Jigsaw Journey is free to download and play. You also have the option of using real money to purchase in-game items. If you wish to disable the ability to spend real money in-game, you can do this by disabling “In-App Purchases” in your device settings.

FEATURES

• All puzzles are FREE to play
• Various items to help you solve harder puzzles
• Puzzles that have up to 256 pieces
• Optionally rotate pieces for harder difficulty
• Endless replay value as you try to beat your own scores and win awesome game bonuses
• Compete with your friends for the highest score
• Each puzzle has information about the scenery and an external link for learning more
• Turn your own photos into customized puzzles
• An optional dock to help keep the board clean
• Play on your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad
• If you have any of your own photos that you would like to see included in the game and shared with your friends, please send them to us at jigsaw-photo@wisee.com and tell us your full name and where they were taken.

Supports:
Game Center – Challenge your friends and compare your scores on the leaderboard.
Facebook - Login with Facebook and compare your scores with your Facebook friends.
